dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Client Side Support Tools Sms Mass and Mid Media to Enrich Engagement Have you ever wanted to learn more about how digital health programs reach clients Join this panel presentation to hear from experts who will share their experiences in using SMS and other mass media campaigns in Malawi Kenya and India to provide health information directly to clients on a range of health issues including diabetes and ANC Some of the exciting strategies that will be discussed include harnessing WhatsApp leveraging SMS with print and media campaigns and insight into scaling up SMS campaigns through strategic public and private partnerships Presented by Suha Patel MDJacaranda Health Brigham and Women s HospitalMPH Candidate Harvard T H Chan School of Public Health
Using Social Networks to Improve Maternal and Newborn Health
